document_data.name: Corauth Belark
document_data.familyrefs: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|43}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 36: The Satraps of Delzimmer, Part 1}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Corauth Belark''' was a member of the [[Belark]] merchant family in [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the [[1373 DR|Year of Rogue Dragons, 1373 DR]].
document_data.Personality:
Corauth was the middle son of [[Oldyle Belark]]'s three sons and was quite the opposite of his staid older brother [[Hlonsker Belark|Hlonsker]]. Corauth was a bit wild and delighted in the pain and suffering of others.
__NOTOC__
document_data.Activities: Corauth and his little brother [[Aslyn]] were free to act almost with impunity around Delzimmer, getting into all sorts of trouble and gleefully terrorizing the common folk.
